Attribute helper.description: This helper function creates an attribute for an HTML tag.

File URL helper.description: This helper function accepts a relative path from the root and creates a relative URI path to the file.

Library helper.description: Attaches an asset library to the template.

Link helper.description: This helper function accepts as first parameter the text, as second parameter the url and a third set of attributes.

Path helper.description: Generates a relative URL path given a route name and parameters.

URL helper.description: Generate an absolute URL given a route name and parameters

Current URL helper.description: Generate an absolute URL to the current page.

Front page URL helper.description: Generate an absolute URL to the front page.

Translation block helper.description: Allows translation for the content with the block
